title: BangaBandhu Olympiad
aboutsmall: BangaBandhu Olympiad is a online quiz game platform based on NCTB Textbook.
learnsub: BangaBandhu Olympiad is a unique game in which kids can easily learn about their books with fun and play mode. Quiz's are text book related questions. This learning game is also worth trying for Adults as well. Lets go.. why not.. give a try now.
fe1sub: A user-interface that is crisp, clear and user-friendly. The interface is designed based on the latest research on User Interface (UI), User Experience (UX) and Interface Design for Learning (IDL) standards.
fe2sub: You can challenge your friend with your friend or classmates in multiplayer or a play alone in single player mode.
fe3sub: You can challenge classmates from any school in your class
fe4sub: You can earn various reward and achivement.
fe5sub: You will challenge your friend in real time and result will update in real time.
fe6ti: Train yourself for exam in fun way
fe6sub: You will learn while playing which will improve your skill.
bangatitle: Autobiography of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman
bangabout: Sheikh Mujib or Mujib, was the first President of Bangladesh and an Indian One of the most influential political figures in the subcontinent Partition movement from British India to protect the rights of Bengalis and Later in the struggle to establish Bangladesh from East Pakistan Centrally provided leadership. Modern of ancient Bengali civilization Sheikh Mujibur Rahman as the architect of the nation. He is called the 'Father of the Nation'. To the public he is Sheikh Mujib and  He was better known as Sheikh Saheb and his title was 'Bangabandhu  Daughter Sheikh Hasina is the current president of Bangladesh Awami League and The current Prime Minister of Bangladesh.
feat1sub: You will find all of your textbook subjects and how many quenstion is available in it.
feat2sub: All subjects are divided into chapters like your book.
feat3ti: Challenge your friend in social media
feat3sub: You can challenge your friend in any social media
feat4sub: The platform is divided into classses so you can find classmate from whol country and challenge them.
usersub: Some of our precious users have given their review here.
totalquen: Total questions about your class is:
totalchap: Total question in this subject is:

singlewait: Your game will start soon. Please wait.
joinheader: Wait for your friend to invitation.
gamesub: You will get 10 questions and 10 points for each correct answer. You have 10 seconds to answer each question.
declined: Your friend has declined your invitation!

policy1: Copotronic Infosystems Limited built the Quiz Olympiad app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Copotronic Infosystems Limited at no cost and is intended for use as is.
policy2: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at Quiz Olympiad unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
infouse1: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Name, Phone Number, School Name, Education Information. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.
infouse2: Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
logsub: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
cookiesusb: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
serviceprovidersub: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
sevicepont2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
sevicepont4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
securitysub: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
childrenpolicysub: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
contactussub: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at sadman@copotronic.com.
